TopicTitle: Link tweakable sliders in VAB and SPH

Articles.Content:
So I checked `what not to suggest` and `already suggested` and noticed a fairly basic one missing. If this has been suggested already can I suggest updating `already suggested` hehe.

Often I want to reduce the fuel and Ox in a tank to be about half a tank and have to move the sliders on their own, leading to a little more fuel or Ox in the tanks than I want.

Could there be a little checkbox on the fuel tank tweakable requester to link the sliders please? (or lock them if they are different)

Then I could just link them and drag one slider to have my fuel/Ox mix stay the same as I reduce tank levels.

Maybe just a ctrl-click-drag could work to reduce clutter.
As optional, it is a supportable idea.

I don't get what you're suggesting

it's so you can tweak both LF and Oxy at the same time
